displaytitle: Latimer Preaching at Saint Paul's Cross
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
Engraved lower left: Painted by Sir George Hayter / Printed by Mr. Queen 
Engraved center: London, Published by Henry Graves & Comp.y Oct.r 14th. 1859: Printsellers to the Queen-6 Pall Mall
Engraved bottom center: New York, Published by W. Schaus, 629 Broadway Oct. 14th, 1859, and entered according to Act of Congress in the Clerk's Office of the District Court of the United States of the Southern District of New York
Blind stamp, lower right [Lugt 2050]: ZVF Printsellers Association
signed: Signed lower right: Engraved by W.H. Egleton

caption: William Henry Egleton (British, active ca. 1833–1862), after Sir George Hayter (1792–1871; born and died London, England), Latimer Preaching at Saint Paul's Cross, 1859. Steel engraving; 61.2 x 85.4 cm (image), 74.6 x 94.8 cm (plate), 76.3 x 98.7 cm (sheet), 76.2 x 101.6 cm (mat). Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943 (x1994-12)
